Name: Cherry Alexander
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
10 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: A rich Black Forest Gateau-like fruity twist on the creamy classic gin-based Alexander and the popular Brandy Alexander .
History: Created by Wayne Collins for Maxxium UK.
Nutrition: One serving of Cherry Alexander contains 222 calories
